text: is a Japanese football player. He plays for the Japan national team. ==Biography== Soma was born in Chofu on February 25, 1997. When he was a Waseda University student, he joined J1 League club Nagoya Grampus in 2018. In August 2019, he moved to Kashima Antlers on loan. In 2020, he returned to Nagoya. In December 2019, Soma was selected the Japan national team for 2019 E-1 Football Championship. At this tournament, he debuted against China on December 10.
